metadata.title: CVE-2021-40083 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Knot Resolver before 5.3.2 is prone to an assertion failure, triggerable bya remote attacker in an edge case (NSEC3 with too many iterations used fora positive wildcard proof).

criterions.comment: knot-resolver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
